message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $15000 to us, reflecting its quality, uniqueness, and the time invested in its creation. We believe it could be an invaluable asset to you. Would you like to proceed with this offer?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. I'm very interested in the product, but I have to consider my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $10000?
